name: The Last Gnomurai
description:
Cruize the blind garden Gnome is lost in the Darkness of the Hell Garden of Deep Darkness. Aract, his cat, will help him to get through this ordeal with sounds. Thanks to Aract and his trusty shovel-katana Shovana, will Cruize find his way? It's up to you to guide the Last Gnomurai.

This game can be played using a controller (xbox).

It can also be played using a mouse + keyboard :

Move : a - d
Jump : space
Attack : left click
Cat interactions : E or right click
Pause : esc

A game made by the Samourai Team : 

Cyril Malec
Foums
Isma LHL
Jaraca
Yukiito
